attributes.action: Change the law in respect of non compliant mothers who fail to obey child contact court orders.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Applicant fathers who have been awarded access to their child or children through the family courts, and have a court order in their favour, need more help from the court system to penalise respondent mothers who do not obey the court orders. Currently the court seem's unable to make a mother comply with a court order if she is not minded to do so.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
